title: 1663-C
statement: C. Pōja Verdontime limit per test1 secondmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstandard inputoutputstandard outputAenar has an array $$$a$$$ consisting of $$$n$$$ integers.InputThe first line is the integer $$$n$$$ ($$$1 \\le n \\le 100$$$).The second line contains $$$n$$$ integers $$$a_i$$$ ($$$0 \\le a_i \\le 3979$$$) — the contents of the array.OutputOutput a single number.
